name: Gnoll Weapon Practicality
summary: You have come to know gnoll weapons as you know yourself.
description:
Whenever you critically hit using flails, khopeshes, mambeles, spears, and war flails, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.Gnoll Weapon Practicality Leads To...

Gnoll Weapon ExpertiseTraitsGnoll: Gnolls are humanoids that resemble hyenas.
